skills.name: SLIVERSHARDS
desc: • Deal 3 hits of random damage to a single target.
• Inflict Exhaust on the target for 1 turn.
• 50% Chance to Transform All Burn Effects into Flame for the duration of battle.
• 85% Chance to Remove a Beneficial Effect per hit on Perfect Hits.

skills.name: FLAGELLANT FRENZY
desc: • Deals 3 hits of random damage to all enemies.
• Remove Negative Effects, including Silver Effects, from self and up to two random allies.
• Grant a Random Beneficial Effect, including Golden Effects, for each Negative Effect removed.

skills.name: ACAPNOS BELLUM
desc: • Grants Immunity to Burn, Stun, Freeze, and Taunt effects to all allies..
